text:
Carlos Vives publishes a photo in a small short and a detail was stolen all the attention
The samarium was very happy with two great cycling, but his "thin legs" became the center of attention.

07 Nov 2019

Several celebrities take advantage of social networks to share with their followers part of their private life, this time the singer Carlos Vives was seen off the stage and was very happy sharing with great cyclists in the middle of the Giro de Rigo, where he confessed That was one of his dreams.
In one of the photographs the singer posed with IvÃ¡n Basso and Alberto Contador, stating that he spent an â€œunforgettable weekend with these super sports starsâ€, however, it was his legs that took all the attention of his publication, Well, judging by the comments, they look very thin.
In the snapshot the samarium, with its uncomplicated style, poses barefoot and with what appears to be a boxer or a very short short that evidenced his legs, which is why he is jokingly asked â€œwhat about the legs when?
"The little legs of Carlos live haha" - "Those little legs" - "Hehehe, has those dry legs Carlitos. But beautiful my loveðŸ˜˜ â€-â€œ Is it the angle of the photo or is this the reality? ðŸ¤£ â€-â€œ And the legs for when? ðŸ˜¬ â€, commented some of the users in the post.
